title: Episode #337: Dumblescruff
description:
- Slug Club member Robert joins the show
- New Potter merchandise hits the market
- Jude Law shows off his Dumbledore scruff
- Episode 336 Rewind: Listeners share their favorite modes of magical transportation
- We break down the Hogwarts Courses in our latest main discussion
- Where do Defense Against the Dark Arts, Charms and Herbology rank on our list?
- Do Divination, Astronomy, Care of Magical Creatures and History of Magic even matter?
- How important is Flying?
- Bonus MuggleCast tackles Muggle Studies, Potions and Transfiguration
- If we were to make our own Hogwarts class schedule, what subjects would make our Top 5?
- Pop Quiz of the Week debuts!
